Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement major UX and workflow improvements to ticketing system

- Update branding from ''Ticketing Portal'' to ''Ticket Portal'' across UI
- Redesign nav bar with left-aligned menu items after logo
- Redirect users to create ticket page on login for faster workflow
- Change page heading from ''Create New Ticket'' to ''New Ticket''
- Make Sub-Category mandatory with automatic ''N/A'' option when unavailable
- Remove auto-fill helper text hints for cleaner UI
- Clean up Business Unit names in database \(remove bracketed descriptions\)
- Add Initiator name and Group/BU columns to tickets table before date/time
- Add download button for attachments in tickets table
- Implement proper SPOC workflow:
  * SPOC auto-filled on ticket creation from classification mapping
  * Assignee left blank initially \(NULL\)
  * SPOC can assign assignee from tickets table
- Fix field mapping: spocId → spoc_user_id, assigneeId → assigned_to

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Connect settings with real user data and finalize BU names

- Display actual user information in settings page \(name, email, BU, role\)
- Show current user''s business unit group and role
- Make account fields read-only with note to contact admin for changes
- Clean up BU name: TD Other → Others \(removed TD prefix\)
- Add SQL migration scripts for BU name cleanup

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
